TopicTitle: Need help; made a "mod" and want to upload it

Articles.Content:
So the mod itself is done but the upload is a WIP

**What does it?**

It changes the basevalue of the stock experiments to match the sciencecap of it.

So you only have to do the experiment once per biome/situation to max your sciencegain to 100%

I manly made this because i did't find a mod like this on the forums and i really wanted to do all the science without visiting each biome a hundret times.

And I wanted to figure out how the modulemanager works and how to publish something the right way, so yes i know this is a tiny mod and its not verry difficult to do but i just wanted to test if i could do it

**[i have literally NO IDEA on how to upload/release something so i made this github page:**

[**https://github.com/maculator/No-more-science-grinding/releases**](https://github.com/maculator/No-more-science-grinding/releases)

**There should be a licence somwhere, but i definitly need some help!]**

Also if this allready exists, please let me know.

Going for dropbox now, seems the easiest way.

**Edited <time datetime="2015-06-18T13:09:08Z" title="06/18/2015 01:09  PM" data-short="9 yr">June 18, 2015</time> by maculator**
  
not needed anymore

I would go for DropBox; it just takes a few seconds\* to upload something.

\*might take longer for larger files\*

Also, I don't think I've seen a mod that does that.

Done it i tried curse, because github was VERRY confusing to me. But curse didn't work out as planned so i went for dropbox:

[http://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/125827-No-More-Science-Grinding](https://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/125827-No-More-Science-Grinding)

This thread can be closed now

Before that though, I would like to know if you could upload it to Kerbal Stuff.

Just so that you've tried the mod uploading sites.
